column4: tetsuo:  Are you absolutely sure that your problems are OS related?  I've had lots of USB problems due to lack of power being given to the USB port
I'm sure. Something stopped working and it's not my mp3 =(
Reason I ask is that I have a laptop here that did something very similar.  Found out that it was a flaky power supply to the ports.  Changed the device to a differnent port and magically it appeared
I wish it were that =( but I tried on different ports and nothing
